Nighthawk

Color Grading   Editing   Cinematography   

A film-noir made on a budget of £0, between Sept. 2019 and Sept. 2020. Having little budget meant having little control over the lighting: from the beginning, we knew that a lot of the look would therefore be created through grading (especially the overall green/orange hues).

Color Grading

The following before/after wipes (from rec709 to the final grade) demonstrate the fairly heavy manipulation which was done in post, creating a consistent look out of very different lighting conditions.

Before
After
